remarks: Value of the composition of two functors.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jan-2017.)
statement:
cofuval2.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
cofuval2.f $e |- ( ph -> F ( C Func D ) G ) $.
cofuval2.x $e |- ( ph -> H ( D Func E ) K ) $.
cofuval2 $p |- ( ph -> ( <. H , K >. o.func <. F , G >. ) = <. ( H o. F ) , ( x e. B , y e. B |-> ( ( ( F ` x ) K ( F ` y ) ) o. ( x G y ) ) ) >. ) $.
$d B x y $.
$d F x y $.

$d K x y $.
